attributes.value: Views loyalty unfavorably
Thinks friendship is important
Finds the idea of fair-dealing foolish and cheats when she finds it profitable
Values tradition
Values cooperation
Thinks that introspection is valueless and those that waste time in self-examination are deluded fools
Strongly believes that a peaceful and ordered society without dissent is best
Is disgusted by merrymakers
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Sees working hard as a foolish waste of time
Sees perseverance in the face of adversity as bull-headed and foolish
Is often nervous
Is a coward, completely overwhelmed by fear when confronted with danger
Lacks confidence in her abilities
Takes no pleasure in her talents and appearance
Is very curious, sometimes to her detriment
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is frustratingly sloppy and careless with every task she sets to carry out
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Forms only fleeting and rare emotional bonds with others
Is very trusting
Enjoys the company of others
Weak
Little willpower
A sum of patience
A natural ability with music
